song.title: My Valentine
song.info:
"my valentine" by edzes & dot
sidbillies 2001
Another popchip, that first was one of ed's compoentries. Later dot added the bridge at 1.14 & adjusted some parts in the verse & mainpart... Love it or hate it!
sidbillies are lookin for some chipmakers. If u think u got the talent, drop a note at auricomkrang.net thnx in advance!
http://modarchive.org/index.php?request=view_by_moduleid&query=135840
